newsitem.title: USA: Players Intl sees loss from property sale.
newsitem.headline: Players Intl sees loss from property sale.

text.p: Players International Inc said it signed a letter of intent to sell its Players Island Resort Casino & Spa, and if completed, it would record a material after-tax loss on the sale.
Financial terms of the agreement were not disclosed.

The casino and gaming company also said it adopted a stockholders' rights plan to ensure that all stockholders would receive fair value for their shares in the event of a proposed takeover and to guard against coercive takeover tactics from third parties. Spokespeople for the company were not immediately available for comment.

Regarding the sale of the property located in Mesquite, Nev., Players said it has the right to invite, negotiate and/or accept offers from other third parties for the sale or other disposition of the Mesquite property until February 28.
